remarks: To consider Fund Raising and Other business
To consider Fund Raising through debt securities in any permitted mode on a private placement basis.
Inter alia, to consider : 1. Fix the date and time for the 28th Annual General Meeting (' ;\GM') of the Bank and other related matters.
inter-alia, to consider the proposal of raising funds through debt securities or equity instruments or convertible debt securities in any permitted mode. (Revised)
